10.<%sM_snpc2>と別れ|<%sM_snpc>が 仲間に加わった！: Parted ways with <%sM_snpc2>|and <%sM_snpc> joined the party!

11.<color_yellow>フウキの仲間の スキルについての説明です！|<br>:
This will explain the skills of SCC members!|
|You can assign skill points and change the|additional skills of SCC members by using the|"SCC Member" command under "Misc.".|
|The "Skill Points" command allows you to|allocate skill points much like your own.|
|The "Additional Skills" command allows you to|select two additional skills to compliment the|three they already know.|
|Choose your skills wisely to strengthen your|comrades!|
